import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import 'react-notifications/lib/notifications.css'; import { NotificationContainer, NotificationManager } from 'react-notifications'; import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { graphql } from 'react-apollo'; import { Mutation } from "react-apollo"; import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx'; import { AvForm, AvField } from 'availity-reactstrap-validation'; import {createNotification} from "components/Notifications/Toast.jsx" import { gql } from 'apollo-boost' import { useQuery, useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; const Formuser=({datos,onChange,query})=>{ const { nombre, usuario, correo, provincia, canton, distrito }= datos; query=gql`${query}`; const Id=datos.Id===undefined ? 1 : datos.Id; return ( <>
{this.props.title}
 {postEmpresa => } ); } export default graphql(queries.addEmpresas)(Formuser);
